mapper.sql: red_id, red_name, red_desc, red_type, red_amount, red_createtime, red_creator, red_state, red_reward_number, red_amt, red_theme, red_use_scope, red_bizid, red_closetime, red_sendtime

if.test: redSearchDO != null and redSearchDO.redSendtimeStart != null and redSearchDO.redSendtimeEnd != null
redSearchDO != null and redSearchDO.redSendtimeStart != null and redSearchDO.redSendtimeEnd == null
redSearchDO != null and redSearchDO.redSendtimeStart == null and redSearchDO.redSendtimeEnd != null
redSearchDO != null and redSearchDO.redClosetimeStart != null and redSearchDO.redClosetimeEnd != null
redSearchDO != null and redSearchDO.redClosetimeStart != null and redSearchDO.redClosetimeEnd == null
redSearchDO != null and redSearchDO.redClosetimeStart == null and redSearchDO.redClosetimeEnd != null

mapper.insert: insert into abc_red (red_name, red_desc, red_type, red_amount, red_createtime, red_creator, red_state, red_reward_number, red_amt, red_theme, red_use_scope, red_bizid, red_closetime, red_sendtime) values (#{redName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{redAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{redCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{redCreator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{redState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{redRewardNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{redAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{redTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redUseScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redBizid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{redClosetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{redSendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into abc_red (red_name, red_desc, red_type, red_amount, red_createtime, red_creator, red_state, red_reward_number, red_amt, red_theme, red_use_scope, red_bizid, red_closetime, red_sendtime) values
( #{item.redName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.redDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.redType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.redAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.redCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.redCreator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.redState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.redRewardNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.redAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.redTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.redUseScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.redBizid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.redClosetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.redSendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select:
SELECT date_format(rs.rs_sendtime,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') AS rs_sendtime, rs.rs_type, CASE WHEN rs.rs_type = 1 THEN '个人奖励' WHEN rs.rs_type = 2 THEN '项目奖励' ELSE '' END AS rs_type_name, rs.rs_theme, rs.rs_valid_amount as rs_amt, u.user_name, u.user_real_name, u.user_phone, date_format(rs.rs_closetime,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') AS rs_closetime, rs.rs_state, CASE WHEN rs.rs_state = 0 THEN '已过期' WHEN rs.rs_state = 1 THEN '未使用' WHEN rs.rs_state = 2 THEN '已使用' ELSE '' END AS red_type_name, l.loan_no, ru.ru_amount, i.in_invest_money FROM abc_red_send rs LEFT JOIN abc_red_use ru ON rs.rs_id = ru.ru_redvsend_id LEFT JOIN abc_user u ON rs.rs_userid = u.user_id and u.user_state != - 1 LEFT JOIN abc_invest i ON ru.ru_biz_id =i.in_id AND rs.rs_userid = i.in_user_id and i.in_invest_state != - 1 LEFT JOIN abc_loan l ON l.loan_id=i.in_origin_id and l.loan_state != - 1 and l.loan_deleted != 1
limit #{pageCondition.pageOffset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageCondition.pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(*) FROM abc_red_send rs LEFT JOIN abc_red_use ru ON rs.rs_id = ru.ru_redvsend_id LEFT JOIN abc_user u ON rs.rs_userid = u.user_id and u.user_state != - 1 LEFT JOIN abc_invest i ON ru.ru_biz_id =i.in_id AND rs.rs_userid = i.in_user_id and i.in_invest_state != - 1 LEFT JOIN abc_loan l ON l.loan_id=i.in_origin_id and l.loan_state != - 1 and l.loan_deleted != 1
